reasoning: As a 70-year-old user with limited tech experience, I need to scroll down to properly see the sign-up form fields that are currently below the visible area. The form elements (email, password) are positioned much lower on the page and I need to access them to complete the registration.
ux_issues: Form is positioned too far down the page, requiring scrolling which may be difficult for elderly users
